thread.title: The “I, Tonya” movie starring Margot Robbie finally casts its Nancy Kerrigan
thread.title_full: The “I, Tonya” movie starring Margot Robbie finally casts its Nancy Kerrigan

author: Olivia Harvey
title: The “I, Tonya” movie starring Margot Robbie finally casts its Nancy Kerrigan

organizations.name: getty images / jim spellman / ron galella, ltd

text:
The “I, Tonya” movie starring Margot Robbie finally casts its Nancy Kerrigan We’re pretty pumped for Margot Robbie’s biopic, I, Tonya. The film is about the 1994 Olympics scandal revolving around the attack on U.S. figure skater, Nancy Kerrigan. Her lead competitor, Tonya Harding , was believed to be behind the scheme, and needless to say, a giant legal and media storm erupted. I, Tonya will tell the story of Harding’s perspective during the attack and the aftermath.
Margot Robbie has been training hard on the ice in order to nail her performance as Harding, while we’ve been waiting in the wings to hear who the film would cast as her onscreen skating rival. Finally, per Deadline , we have learned that Caitlin Carver will play Nancy Kerrigan in I, Tonya. 
You may recognize Carver from Paper Towns or Rules Don’t Apply , but more likely you’ll recognize her from her television work. Getty Images / Jim Spellman / Ron Galella, Ltd. Carver has made several recurring television appearances on The Fosters and on VH1’s Hit The Floor. The actress is also slated to appear in episodes of the upcoming show Dear White People, which is based on the film by the same name.
Getty Images / Paul Archuleta Sebastian Stan has been cast as Harding’s ex-husband, Jeff Gillooly, and Allison Janney as Harding’s mother, LaVona Golden. Check out this leaked photo of Robbie, Stan, and Janney from set.
Just look at everyone’s ’90s hairstyles. We love. @Regrann from @wlmfans: Here are Several brand-new photos from the set of “I, Tonya” that have surfaced online; giving us our first look at Sebastian Stan and Alison Janney in the film! “I, Tonya”, which also stars Margot Robbie, Paul Walter Hauser, Julianne Nicholson, Caitlin Carver, McKenna Grace and Bojana Novakovic , is written by Steven Rogers and directed by Craig Gillespie. The film currently has no release date. • Source: Just Jared #ITonya #TonyaHarding #MargotRobbie #SebastianStan #PaulWalterHauser #JulianneNicholson #CaitlinCarver #McKennaGrace #BojanaNovakovic #AllisonJanney #JeffGillooly #CraigGillespie #StevenRogers #Olympics #OlympicGames #FigureSkating #NancyKerrigan #USFBA #ITonyaMovie #wlmfans 
A photo posted by Focus idris [The Batman] (@el_fokiss) on Jan 24, 2017 at 6:38am PST 
I, Tonya is currently filming and is slated to be released in 2018. We can’t wait to see this story played out on the big screen.
